channel.title: I'm stupid
channel.description:
I have forgotten my MSN and hotmail password and my secret question. Any type of keylogger out there that can go back in time to information I have written?
Or do I have to call in to microsoft and somehow get it that way?

item.title: I'm stupid
item.dc:creator: Level
item.description:
Make better secret questions, something that doesn’t change over time.

Point being, you’re screwed.

Read full topic

item.title: I'm stupid
item.dc:creator: Guf
item.description:
Firefox saved passwords are accessible under options; There is a list of site/username saved and an option to display the saved password also.
Assuming you said yes to FF saving logins for that page, and said yes to it asking to save the changed password, then it should be in that list.

Read full topic

item.description:

Now, is there a chance firefox saved my password on some temporary file or cookie?

item.title: I'm stupid
item.dc:creator: Mangled
item.description:
Mr.Shadow:

My bad. I thought you meant the pen we have today, not the one that you need to dip into ink after every word.

You’ve dug yourself out of that one… just… :meh:

Read full topic

item.title: I'm stupid
item.dc:creator: Mr.Shadow
item.description:
Mangled*:

A pen is a generic term for a tool that uses ink or dye for writing on a surface. A pen is basically the beginning of recorded human history. Classically it’s a fundamental in information communication, word of mouth is less reliable.

My point being he’s stupid, and now you look stupid too.

My bad. I thought you meant the pen we have today, not the one that you need to dip into ink after every word.

Read full topic

item.title: I'm stupid
item.dc:creator: Aze
item.description:
Mangled*:

Do you know about pen and paper? It’s been around for a few thousand years…

You know, maybe write it down if you have the memory of a stick…

It’s literally ridiculous to forget your password though. That’s why you’re being ridiculed.

Yea totally! Or even better, write it on the wall of the WC so if you go and take a shit, you only need to look up! Now how awesome is that?

item.title: I'm stupid
item.dc:creator: RabidMonkey
item.description:
I have never heard of reverse-keylogging; if you find a way to warp space and time to do so, let me know.

If you have trouble remembering passwords, might I suggest using a password safe application, like KeePass?

item.title: I'm stupid
item.dc:creator: Kairouseki
item.description:
You forgot your secret question or just the answer to it? It’d be kind of be counterproductive to make you remember a question that’s supposed to be used to remember your password. If you forgot the answer, then you are stupid, seeing as it’s supposed to be easy to remember .

Anyway, you should use Firefox, it will remember your passwords for you and automatically type them in when you go to the page.

Read full topic
